authors: Lawal OU, Bryan N, Parreira VR, Anderson R, Chen Y, Precious M, Goodridge L
abstract: Aquatic ecosystems serve as crucial reservoirs for pathogens and antimicrobial resistance genes, thus presenting a significant global health risk. Here, we investigated the phylogenomics of Lakes and other aquatic ecosystems can harbor harmful bacteria that can make people sick and resist antibiotics, posing a significant global health risk.
